cardName: Whispering Vines of the Enchanted Marsh
prompt: A mystical swamp scene shrouded in mist. The focal point is a cluster of glowing, ethereal vines weaving through ancient, moss-covered trees. These vines emit a soft, otherworldly light with small, sparkling particles floating around them. The ground is covered with luminescent mushrooms and patches of bioluminescent moss that faintly light up the surroundings. Enchanting and mysterious, the swamp exudes a magical aura. The art style is dark and vibrant fantasy with eerie lighting and glowing plants, creating an enchanting atmosphere.
